headline: Multimodal Understanding & Generation
summary: Researching multimodal large models, agents, and video question answering, with a focus on vision-language generative intelligence and cutting-edge methods in cross-modal understanding, autonomous reasoning, and long-form video analysis.

focus.title: Multimodal Large Models
focus.description: Investigate robust alignment mechanisms across vision, language, and speech, combining contrastive learning with instruction tuning to enhance cross-modal semantic understanding and generation.

focus.title: Agent Systems
focus.description: Develop autonomous agents powered by large models, focusing on tool invocation, reasoning, planning, and environmental interaction for automated task execution.

focus.title: Video Question Answering
focus.description: Design temporal modeling and keyframe selection strategies for long-video understanding, integrating parameter-efficient tuning and few-shot learning to improve QA generalization and real-time performance.
